trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性和方法，以操作登錄。

trans-unit.source: To use these properties, you must have Read and Write permission from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這些屬性，您必須擁有讀取和寫入權限從<xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Any code running with full trust (under the default security policy, this is any code installed on the user's local hard drive) has the necessary permissions to access the registry.
trans-unit.target: 以完全信任執行的任何程式碼 （在預設的安全性原則，這是安裝在使用者的本機硬碟上的任何程式碼） 具有存取登錄的必要權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read data from the registry
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會讀取值`Name`從`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`並將它顯示在訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` is primarily used to store information about file associations in Windows.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` 主要用來儲存在 Windows 檔案關聯的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，只有這些權限授與完成工作所需。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
AllAccess
Create, read, and write access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。

trans-unit.source: Create
Create access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄變數的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: NoAccess
No access to registry variables.
Read
Read access to registry variables.
Write
Write access to registry variables.
The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example gets the names of the subkeys for the `ClassesRoot` registry key and adds them to `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會取得名稱的子機碼的`ClassesRoot`登錄機碼並將其加入`ListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a `ListBox` named `ListBox1` in your project.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有`ListBox`名為`ListBox1`專案中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` is primarily used to store settings for devices on the computer.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` 主要用來在電腦上儲存裝置的設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，只有這些權限授與完成工作所需。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

Create, read, and write access to registry variables.

trans-unit.target: 建立登錄變數的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example creates the subkey `MyDeviceSettings`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立子機碼`MyDeviceSettings`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_CURRENT_USER" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_CURRENT_USER" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` is primarily used to store per-user settings, such as colors and fonts, in Windows.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` 主要用來儲存每個使用者設定，例如色彩和字型，在 Windows 中。

trans-unit.source: The key differ according to the user.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵會因使用者而異。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

Create, read, and write access to registry variables.

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example deletes the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`.
Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type, which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_DYNDATA" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_DYNDATA" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_DYNDATA` is used to store dynamic registry data, such as that used by Virtual Device Drivers and is supported only on Windows 95/98 systems.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_DYNDATA` 用來儲存動態登錄資料，例如使用的虛擬裝置驅動程式，並支援只能在 Windows 95/98 系統上。

trans-unit.source: On non-Windows 95/98 systems, calling any methods of the key returned by `Registry.DynData`, such as `CreateSubKey`, `DeleteSubKey`, `GetSubKeyCount`, `GetValueCount`, etc., will throw a <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 在非 Windows 95/98 系統上呼叫任何方法所傳回之金鑰的`Registry.DynData`，例如`CreateSubKey`， `DeleteSubKey`， `GetSubKeyCount`，`GetValueCount`等等，將會擲回<xref:System.IO.IOException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

Create, read, and write access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。

trans-unit.target: 建立登錄變數的存取權限。

The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example deletes the subkey tree `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會刪除子機碼樹狀結構`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />.
Key from which the value is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取值的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Required.
<see langword="String" />.
Value to be retrieved.
Required.
<see langword="Object" />.
Default value to be supplied if the value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 當值不存在時要提供的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
Gets a value from a registry key.
Gets a value from a registry key.
`valueName` is not case-sensitive.
A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name.
trans-unit.target: 登錄機碼可以包含一個不是任何名稱相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name.
trans-unit.target: 當這個未命名的值顯示在登錄編輯程式中時，字串 「 （預設） 」 會顯示而不是名稱。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either null or the empty string ("") for `valueName`.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取這個未命名的值，指定 null 或空字串 ("") 的`valueName`。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `GetValue` method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`GetValue`方法。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a `MessageBox`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會讀取值`Name`從`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`並顯示在`MessageBox`。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有讀取登錄機碼所需的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> that contains the specified value has been marked for deletion.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定值的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 已標記為刪除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyName" /> does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyName" /> 不是以有效的登錄根目錄開頭。

trans-unit.source: to read from the registry.
Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Read" />
to read a registry key of type REG_EXPAND_SZ.
Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type, which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` is usually used to store settings that do not vary from user to user in Windows.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` 通常用來儲存不會在 Windows 中改變使用者的設定。

trans-unit.source: All users of the computer share this key.
trans-unit.target: 電腦的所有使用者都共用這個機碼。

trans-unit.source: Its five subkeys (`Hardware`, `SAM`, `Security`, `Software`, and `System`) hold configuration data for the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 五個子機碼 (`Hardware`， `SAM`， `Security`， `Software`，和`System`) 保存在本機電腦的組態資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

Description
AllAccess
Create, read, and write access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。

trans-unit.source: Create
Create access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄變數的存取權限。

No access to registry variables.

Read access to registry variables.

Write access to registry variables.
The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example opens the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences` and sets the value `FontColor` to `"red"`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會開啟子機碼`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`和設定的值`FontColor`至`"red"`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type, which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` is used to access performance information for software components.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` 用來存取軟體元件的效能資訊。

trans-unit.source: Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing.
trans-unit.target: 安裝和執行時，這會將計數器資料時，每個軟體元件會建立其物件和計數器的機碼。

trans-unit.source: This data is not stored in the registry, although the registry is used to access it.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料不會儲存在登錄中，不過登錄用來存取它。

trans-unit.source: Instead, calling registry functions via `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，呼叫登錄函式，透過`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA`會使系統從適當的系統物件管理員收集的資料。

trans-unit.source: This key does not exist on Windows 98 systems; an attempt to use it other than calling the `Name` method will throw an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引鍵不存在於 Windows 98 系統。嘗試使用不呼叫`Name`方法會擲回<xref:System.IO.IOException>。

trans-unit.source: This key cannot normally be written to; attempting to create a subkey on it will throw an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 此機碼通常無法寫入。嘗試在其上建立子機碼將會擲回<xref:System.IO.IOException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
AllAccess
Create, read, and write access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。

trans-unit.source: Create
Create access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄變數的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: NoAccess
No access to registry variables.
Read
Read access to registry variables.
Write
Write access to registry variables.
The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。

trans-unit.source: To
See
Create a registry key and set its value
trans-unit.target: 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: Delete a registry key
[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)
Read a value from a registry key
[How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)
This example gets the value `ThisSoftware` from the `MyCompany` subkey.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會取得值`ThisSoftware`從`MyCompany`子機碼。

trans-unit.source: Writes a value to a registry key.
trans-unit.target: 將值寫入至登錄機碼中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />.
Name of the key to be written to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入之索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Required.
<see langword="String" />.
Name of the value to be written.
Required.
<see langword="Object" />.
Value to be written.
Required.
Writes a value to a registry key.
trans-unit.target: 將值寫入至登錄機碼中。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的索引鍵或值不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method.
To
See
Set a value in a registry key
[How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中設定的值`FontColor`為"red"索引鍵中`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="Nothing" />.
<paramref name="keyName" /> does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyName" /> 不是以有效的登錄根目錄開頭。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="valueName" /> is longer than the maximum length allowed (255 characters).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="valueName" /> 超過允許的最大長度 (255 個字元)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> is read-only and thus cannot be written to; for example, it is a root-level node, or it has not been opened with write access..
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 為唯讀，因此無法寫入 (例如，它是根層次節點，或未以寫入權限來開啟它)。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有建立或修改登錄機碼所需的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: to modify the specified registry key if it exists, or to create the registry key if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改指定的登錄機碼，如果存在，或不存在時建立登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Write" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Create" />
<see langword="String" />.
Name of the key to be written to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入之索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Required.
<see langword="String" />.
Name of the value to be written.
Required.
<see langword="Object" />.
Value to be written.
Required.
<see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind" />.
Required.
Writes a value to a registry key.
trans-unit.target: 將值寫入至登錄機碼中。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的索引鍵或值不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method.
To
See
Set a value in a registry key
[How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)

trans-unit.source: This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中設定的值`FontColor`為"red"索引鍵中`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="Nothing" />.
<paramref name="keyName" /> does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyName" /> 不是以有效的登錄根目錄開頭。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="keyName" /> is longer than the maximum length allowed (255 characters).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyName" /> 超過允許的最大長度 (255 個字元)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The type of <paramref name="value" /> does not match the registry data type specified by <paramref name="valueKind" />, therefore the data cannot be converted properly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的型別與 <paramref name="valueKind" /> 所指定的登錄資料型別不符，因此無法正確轉換資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> is read-only, and thus cannot be written to; for example, it is a root-level node, or it has not been opened with write access.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 為唯讀，因此無法寫入 (例如，它是根層次節點，或未以寫入權限來開啟它)。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有建立或修改登錄機碼所需的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: to modify the specified registry key if it exists, or to create the registry key if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改指定的登錄機碼，如果存在，或不存在時建立登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Write" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Create" />
Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> type, which provides access to <see langword="HKEY_USERS" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey" /> 型別，此型別可提供 <see langword="HKEY_USERS" /> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: `HKEY_USERS` is primarily used to store default settings for first-time users.
trans-unit.target: `HKEY_USERS` 主要用來儲存第一次使用者的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> class, which is in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions> namespace, controls access to registry variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission>類別，這是在<xref:System.Security.Permissions>命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> can access them.
trans-unit.target: 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermission> 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: Registry permission access values are defined by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 登錄權限存取值是由 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess> 列舉定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table details its members.
trans-unit.target: 下表會詳細說明其成員。

trans-unit.source: Value
Access to Registry Variables
AllAccess
Create, read, and write
Create
Create
NoAccess
No access.
Read
Read
Write
Write

[How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)

This example counts and displays the number of values in the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會計算，並顯示登錄機碼中的值數目。
